'''''SEVEN 12''''' is the twelfth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[1995]].<ref name="jstor" /> Volume 12 celebrates the 30th anniversary of the Wade Center.<ref name="vii">{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>

**By: Petra-Angela Wacker
